attributes.action: Deport Islamic Terrorists and Fundamentalists to Pay for the Gurkhas to live in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has said the cost of allowoing all the Gurkhas to settle here would cost talists the British Taxpayer too much! If we deported all Islamic Terrorists and fundaments who are costing the British Taxpayer a fortune the money would be better spent on a people who we owe a debt of honour to.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
